alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 26 at 6:16AM ChST until February 26 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...STRONG DAYTIME WINDS AND DRY CONDITIONS MAY LEAD TO RAPID FIRE SPREAD ACROSS PARTS OF GUAM... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect until 6 PM ChST this evening. * WIND...Sustained 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 30 mph this afternoon. * HUMIDITY...As low as 60 percent this afternoon. * HIGHEST THREAT...Southern part of Guam, mainly along and south of Cross Island Road. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Scattered showers are expected today, but have not started yet so dry conditions still exist. This watch may be cancelled early if showers improve the overall dry conditions. Fuel stick readings are around 14.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
